de.polygonal.core.math.Mathematics

type
class

Various math functions and constants.

Static Variables

DEG_RAD(inline,null) : Float

Multiply value by this constant to convert from degrees to radians (PI / 180).

EPS(inline,null) : Float

Default system epsilon.

LN10(inline,null) : Float

The natural logarithm of 10.

LN2(inline,null) : Float

The natural logarithm of 2.

NEGATIVE_INFINITY(inline,null) : Float

IEEE 754 negative infinity.

NaN(inline,null) : Float

IEEE 754 NAN.

PI(inline,null) : Float

PI.

PI2(inline,null) : Float

2 * PI.

PI_OVER_2(inline,null) : Float

PI / 2.

PI_OVER_4(inline,null) : Float

PI / 4.

POSITIVE_INFINITY(inline,null) : Float

IEEE 754 positive infinity.

RAD_DEG(inline,null) : Float

Multiply value by this constant to convert from radians to degrees (180 / PI).

SQRT2(inline,null) : Float

The square root of 2.

ZERO_TOLERANCE(inline,null) : Float

Value below ZERO_TOLERANCE is treated as zero.

Static Methods

inline abs(x : Int) : Int

Returns the absolute value of x.

inline ceil(x : Float) : Int

Fast version of Math.ceil(x).

inline clamp(x : Int, min : Int, max : Int) : Int

Clamps x to the interval [min, max] so min <= x <= max.

inline clampSym(x : Int, i : Int) : Int

Clamps x to the interval [-i, +i] so -i <= x <= i.

inline cmpAbs(x : Float, y : Float, eps : Float) : Bool

Compares x and y using an absolute tolerance of eps.

inline cmpZero(x : Float, eps : Float) : Bool

Compares x to zero using an absolute tolerance of eps.

inline eqSgn(x : Int, y : Int) : Bool

Returns true if the sign of x and y is equal.

inline exp(a : Int, n : Int) : Int

Fast integer exponentiation for base a and exponent n.

inline fabs(x : Float) : Float

Fast version of Math.abs(x).

inline fclamp(x : Float, min : Float, max : Float) : Float

Clamps x to the interval [min, max] so min <= x <= max.

inline fclampSym(x : Float, i : Float) : Float

Clamps x to the interval [-i, +i] so -i <= x <= i.

inline floor(x : Float) : Int

Fast version of Math.floor(x).

inline fmax(x : Float, y : Float) : Float

Fast version of Math.max(x, y).

inline fmin(x : Float, y : Float) : Float

Fast version of Math.min(x, y).

inline fsgn(x : Float) : Int

Extracts the sign of x.
fsgn(0) = 0.

inline fwrap(value : Float, lower : Float, upper : Float) : Float

Wraps x to the interval [min, max] so min <= x <= max.

inline gcd(x : Int, y : Int) : Int

Computes the greatest common divisor of x and y.
See http://www.merriampark.com/gcd.htm.

inline inRange(x : Float, min : Float, max : Float) : Bool

Returns true if min <= x <= max.

inline invSqrt(x : Float) : Float

Computes the 'quake-style' fast inverse square root of x.

inline isEven(x : Int) : Bool

Returns true if x is even.

inline isPow2(x : Int) : Bool

Returns true if x is a power of two.

inline lerp(a : Float, b : Float, t : Float) : Float

Linear interpolation over interval [a, b] with t = [0, 1].

inline log10(x : Float) : Float

Returns the base-10 logarithm of x.

inline max(x : Int, y : Int) : Int

Returns max(x, y).

inline maxPrecision(x : Float, precision : Int) : Float

Removes excess floating point decimal precision from x.

inline min(x : Int, y : Int) : Int

Returns min(x, y).

inline nextPow2(x : Int) : Int

Calculates the next highest power of 2 of x.
x must be in the range 0...(2^30)
Returns x if already a power of 2.

inline ofBool(x : Bool) : Int

returns
1 if x is true and zero if x is false.
Converts the boolean expression x to an integer.

inline round(x : Float) : Int

Fast version of Math.round(x).
Half-way cases are rounded away from zero.

inline roundTo(x : Float, y : Float) : Float

Rounds x to the iterval y.

inline sgn(x : Int) : Int

Returns the sign of x.
sgn(0) = 0.

inline slerp(a : Float, b : Float, t : Float) : Float

Spherically interpolates between two angles.
See http://www.paradeofrain.com/2009/07/interpolating-2d-rotations/.

inline snap(x : Float, y : Float) : Float

Snaps x to the grid y.

inline sqrt(x : Float) : Float

Computes the 'quake-style' fast square root of x.

inline toDeg(rad : Float) : Float

Converts rad to degrees.

inline toRad(deg : Float) : Float

Converts deg to radians.

inline wrap(x : Int, min : Int, max : Int) : Int

Wraps x to the interval [min, max] so min <= x <= max.

inline wrapToPI(x : Float) : Float

Wraps an angle x to the range -PI...PI.

inline wrapToPI2(x : Float) : Float

Wraps an angle x to the range 0...2*PI.
